model
Class Task

java.lang.Object
  model.SavableToService
      model.Task
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Task
extends SavableToService
implements Serializable

This task represents a task that can be created, fulfilled, edited and viewed. Tasks are savableToService so they can be stored to the webservice via the ServiceManager

Author:
zturchan
See Also:
